image_0.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting regally atop a pile of cushions, with the blue sky shining through a sheer curtain behind him.

image_1.alt: Blurry photo of Gizmo the cat being held aloft by Mark as he hunts for a moth. Only Gizmo's face is in focus.

image_2.alt: Gizmo the cat looking up at the camera from atop a small cat tower.

image_3.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on his knitted mat, with a sunlit window behind him.

image_4.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on his heated blanket, looking as though he's posing for a portrait.

image_5.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on a bookshelf in partial sunlight, looking inquisitively up at the camera.

image_6.alt: Gizmo the cat as a kitten, sitting at the base of a cat tower.

image_7.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up asleep on a blanket stretched over Mark's knees.

image_8.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on a blanket stretched over Mark's knees, with his belly turned up, cheekily looking at the camera.

image_9.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up asleep with his paw stretched out and placed on Mark's hand.

image_10.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing in front of a fireplace, looking at the camera with large eyes.

image_11.alt: Gizmo the cat lying asleep over Mark's knee in front of the fireplace, with both his front paws stretched way out in front of him.

image_12.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up behind a curtain in the sunlight, looking at the camera.

image_13.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up next to Mark's hip in bed, looking at the camera.

image_14.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up asleep on a blanket with his paw covering his face.

image_15.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing in sunlight shining through a set of blinds, projecting lines of shadow onto him.

image_16.alt: Close up shot of Gizmo the cat's face as he watches the lawn.

image_17.alt: Gizmo the cat sleeping on the carpet in the sunlight next to a red plastic rod that is part of one of his toys.

image_18.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on Mark's desk, looking back at the camera with curtains behind him.

image_19.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up in the sunlight against Mark's outstretched feet, with his ears brightly backlit by the sun.

image_20.alt: Close up shot of Gizmo the cat as he looks out of a window.

image_21.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on Mark's shoulder, sniffing at a wall.

image_22.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on Mark's desk next to his laptop, beneath a lamp, looking back over his shoulder dramatically.

image_23.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he looks out a window.

image_24.alt: Close up of half Gizmo the cat's face in the sunlight.

image_25.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on his back on a bed, cheekily showing his belly.

image_26.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting in a paper bag in the sunlight, looking directly up at the camera.

image_27.alt: Gizmo the cat asleep on his blue knitted mat.

image_28.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting behind a curtain, enjoying the afternoon sunlight and looking up past the camera.

image_29.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he lies on his blue knitted mat.

image_30.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he lies in his hammock on top of his cat tower.

image_31.alt: Gizmo the cat hiding in a red and blue plastic shopping bag, looking out with very large eyes.

image_32.alt: Gizmo the cat and Mark asleep together on the couch in the afternoon sun.

image_33.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting politely on his knitted mat on Mark's desk, looking at the camera.

image_34.alt: Gizmo the cat crouching in a paper bag.

image_35.alt: Extreme close up of Gizmo the cat's face, with very large eyes.

image_36.alt: Gizmo the cat lying in his tunnel, with very large eyes.

image_37.alt: Gizmo the cat sleeping in the sunlight next to a laundry basket, breathing slowly.

image_38.alt: Gizmo the cat sleeping on his knitted mat and breathing slowly.

image_39.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he happily kneads a red dressing gown.

image_40.alt: Gizmo the cat's eyes going from normal sized to very big.

image_41.alt: Gizmo the cat's face barely peeking out from beneath a jacket that is laid over a full laundry basket.

image_42.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing on his blue knitted mat next to a sunlit window, looking away from the window.

image_43.alt: Gizmo the cat sleeping in the sunlight on his blue knitted mat, with his paws stretched out towards the camera and his face resting against a pile of books on alternative medicine.

image_44.alt: Gizmo the cat standing on Mark's legs, looking off to the side with very large eyes.

image_45.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up on top of a red jacket, which is draped over a laundry basket.

image_46.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up on a red dressing gown, looking grumpily at the camera without lifting his head.

image_47.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on his back on a blanket, offering his belly for some belly rubs.

image_48.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting very alertly by Mark's feet, looking at the camera.

image_49.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up in a heart shape on a red jacket.

image_50.alt: Gizmo the cat looking sleepily at the camera while loafing on his sleeping mat.

image_51.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting in his tunnel in the sunlight, looking to the side out of its entrance.

image_52.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on a windowsill, looking at the camera.

image_53.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on top of a cat tower, looking up at the camera with big eyes.

image_54.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on the carpet, licking his nose.

image_55.alt: Close up photo of Gizmo the cat in a tucked loaf on the carpet, staring at the floor in front of him with very big eyes.

image_56.alt: Gizmo the cat lying in front of a lit fireplace, with his front paws stretched out to rest on an insulated mitt, looking back at the camera.

image_57.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he sleeps on a blanket.

image_58.alt: Gizmo the cat standing on his hind legs, holding Mark's hand still while he eats a treat from it.

image_59.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting in a plasting shopping bag, looking out past the camera with big eyes.

image_60.alt: Gizmo the cat's head and front legs poking out from his spot on a blanket on Mark's lap, beneath his desk.

image_61.alt: Gizmo the cat nested in a fluffy white blanket.

image_62.alt: Gizmo the cat's sleeping face poking out from a nest in a fluffy white and blue blanket, with his nose and tail covering his nose.

image_63.alt: Gizmo the cat lying in a box on its side. He barely fits, with his tail and back feet poking out.

image_64.alt: Gizmo the cat in a half-sphinx in the sunlight, looking large due to the low angle, with a toy mouse in the foreground.

image_65.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up on a blue blanket over a lap, looking sleepily at the camera.

image_66.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on a blue blanket on a bet, along the gap made between Mark's legs, with his front paws outstretched towards the camera.

image_67.alt: Gizmo the cat lying inside a sunlit paper bag.

image_68.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing on a blue blanket over a lap, looking up at the camera in golden light.

image_69.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on the carpet, looking almost directly up at the camera, with his front paws just barely visible beneath him.

image_70.alt: Gizmo the cat lying in a sunlit paper bag, with one paw stretched out towards the camera.

image_71.alt: Gizmo the cat stretched out on his side, lying in partial sunlight on Mark's legs on the couch.

image_72.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he tries to sleep on a blue blanket, with a paw covering his nose.

image_73.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up on a blur blanket, exposing his belly and looking cheekily at the camera.

image_74.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing on the armrest of a sofa, with his paw resting over his front paws.

image_75.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on top of a cat tower next to a window, caught mid blink and as he licks his nose.

image_76.alt: Gizmo the cat looking back past the camera while standing in front of a wire mesh keeping him from leaving the house, with a tiled area and a lawn behind it.

image_77.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on his side in a patch of sunlight on the floor, stretching his front paws out.

image_78.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing in the sunlight in front of a wire mesh keeping him from leaving the house, intently watching the outdoors.

image_79.alt: Gizmo the cat standing up to eating a treat out from between Mark's thumb and forefinger, using one of his front paws to gently hold Mark's hand in place.

image_80.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting in the sunlight in front of a wire mesh keeping him from leaving the house, intently watching the outdoors as he sniffs the air.

image_81.alt: Gizmo the cat asleep in a hammock on top of a cat tower, next to a window.

image_82.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up on a blanket on a bed, getting some belly rubs.

image_83.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up in the gap between Mark's knees as he lies on the couch.

image_84.alt: Gizmo the cat mid-lick, standing up on his hind legs to eat a treat out from between Mark's thumb and forefinger, using one of his front paws to gently hold Mark's hand in place.

image_85.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on top of a cat tower, looking up at the camera with his head tilted to the right.

image_86.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing on a pile of scarves in a dimly lit room, looking up at the camera with big eyes.

image_87.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat looking at the camera while curled up on a blanket, with his tail covering his nose and mouth.

image_88.alt: Gizmo the cat lying next to Mark's leg on the couch with his paws stretch out beneath his chin while he looks past the camera to keep an eye on the outdoors.

image_89.alt: Gizmo the cat looking sleepily up at the camera while resting on a chair covered in a fluffy blanket and leaning against the fluffy inner of a hoodie draped over the back of the chair.

image_90.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing inside a large plastic shopping bag, looking at the camera with enormous eyes.

image_91.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat caught mid-lick while licking his nose.

image_92.alt: Top down close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he's curled up asleep on a pile of colourful socks, with a paw covering his face.

image_93.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on his blue knitted mat next to a window, licking one of his front paws.

image_94.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face smushed against the side of the blue laundry basket he's lying in.

image_95.alt: Gizmo the cat's paw resting on top of Mark's hand on the couch.
